text:
Fix for what?  You can configure using whatever configurator you want.  Log4j 
1.2 will give XML files to the DOMConfigurator, others to the 
PropertyConfigurator.  Log4j 1.3 uses Joran instead for XML files, but still 
handles them just fine.
